title: Strengthening CS Competencies: Explicit Response-Based Mobile Microlearning Program

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic social science concepts and basic mobile device usage skills
context.additional_context: Service/Customer Engagement Role-Specific Competency Development Program

learning_goals: Learners can provide explicit responses to given social science content with over 80% accuracy
Learners can derive correct answers with over 70% probability by analyzing error patterns in optional questions provided during the program
Learners can access the mobile platform at least three times daily for one week to complete learning modules

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
